title: Moments in Time
brief_description: In response to the challenge “Create a moving image work on the theme ‘Pacific Explorer’” these students came up with a highly entertaining magazine style ‘TV show’ featuring a story on an old lady and her memories of her family’s early days in Australia.An animated short entered to “Create a Stamp Story” section of ACMI’s ‘Screen It’ media making competition for Primary Schools.
